a: The event is an in-person conference featuring keynote presentations, panel discussions, hands-on workshops, and networking sessions. All sessions will be conducted in English.
Developers, entrepreneurs, investors, researchers, and anyone interested in Web3 and AI technologies. Whether you're a beginner or an expert, there's content tailored for all levels.
Your ticket includes access to all sessions, workshops, networking events, meals (lunch and coffee breaks), and event materials. Accommodation and travel are not included.
The event will be held at Cozone Ankara.
You can register for the event by clicking the 'Get Ticket' button in the navigation menu. Complete the registration form and proceed with the payment to secure your spot.
